docs.snippet: The story of a Japanese improvement on Sharpe's rifle proves to be incorrect. It is only an imitation of an alteration made at SHARPE  Co.'s factory, and afterwards discarded by them as a failure.

headline.main: FROM WASHINGTON.; The Post-office Deficiency Bill in the Senate. ATTEMPT TO LIBERATE THADDEUS HYATT. Interesting Debate in the House on the Pacific Railroad Bill.

docs.lead_paragraph: The story of a Japanese improvement on Sharpe's rifle proves to be incorrect. It is only an imitation of an alteration made at SHARPE Co.'s factory, and afterwards discarded by them as a failure.
